title: Chocolate and Gnomes: The Second Box
description: Beckâ€™s back for a second helping of chocolate. Boyfriend Cal, has inherited a country cottage and after a bit of persuasion she agrees to move in.Life in the village is soon disrupted as hippies, Hunta and Inca, turn up on the trail of Mr Sneak, an anonymous poison pen writer. Why is he targeting the garden gnomes?Havoc ensures and no amounts of hints are going to get rid of the unwanted hippies. What is the secret room in the cottage and can it save Beck from the madness around her?Getting to know the locals proves a challenge as one disaster follows another.If all else fails THERE'S ALWAYS CHOCOLATE!
author: Roger David Francis
